short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will control the playback speed of Youtube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Youtube-playback-speed-extention

Simple and easy -> Youtube playback speed extension for Google Chrome

Alt + 0 = Set speed to Normal (1)
Alt + + = Increases playback speed by 0.25
Alt + - = Decreases playback speed by 0.25
